caption.center: PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF MICHIGAN, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. GARY L.

opinion.opinion_text:
On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal from the April 5, 1999 decision of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the questions presented should be reviewed by this Court.
Court of Appeals No. 217101.
